title: Is St. Pete the New North Pole?
meta_description: Is St. Pete the New North Pole?
post_excerpt: From Christmas pop-up bars to holiday markets all over the city, St. Pete is the place to be this holiday season. With the cooler temps, people are bustling all over...
post_content:
From Christmas pop-up bars to holiday markets all over the city, St. Pete is the place to be this holiday season. With the cooler temps, people are bustling all over town and ready for all the holidays to ensue. Check out the events below to get you right into the holiday spirit.  

1. Miracle at Mezz — This Christmas-themed bar first started in NYC and has since flocked its way down to Intermezzo Coffee & Cocktails for the very cool winter season. 

2. Boat Parades — There are more than three separate boat parades taking place this holiday season: Clearwater, Tarpon Springs, and Treasure Island just to name a few!

3. Jingle Bell Run — For those of you that are looking for more of an athletic challenge, try out this year's 35th Annual Jingle Bell Route. This 3-mile run is full of fun for the entire family.
